root.name: Touch Solitaire
root.description: OverviewTouch Solitaire is a solitaire program from Nintendo for DSiWare. The game costs 200 Nintendo Points across all territories. The game features Klondike and Spider variants of solitaire, each with two difficulty settings. Touch Solitaire also keeps a running count of the total number of wins in each mode as well as win/loss statistics for the current date.
